body:
Hit me up on discord if you want to do one - 1 person per team, if you've done one in the past please give somebody else a chance. DISCORD: boldandbrash#4517

What is your IGN and team?
seuthyfromboe, Apollo

How many tournaments have you participated in?
I think 2, BoE and Conquest Inc. I was banned during Project Redemption lul

Any team in particular you'd like to face off against?
Any team that has done good in past tournaments

Any team you don't want to face off against?
not really

How do you think you'll do this time around?
I'd say top 5 probably

Any teams you have a rivalry with? Not sure tbh

What do you think is your team's best strength, and your best strength alone?
Probably our chemistry because we have all been on the team for a decent amount of time and are all good friends, my strength alone is probably my melee, not trying to overrate myself but I would say i'm pretty decent

What do you think is your team's worst weakness, and your worst weakness alone?
Our comms are horrible, and my bow is awful

What have you done to prepare?
Scrimmed a lot more than I did before last tourney

Anything you'd like to say to your opponents?
 imryaan is 12
